speech:
Specify items and quantities. 
products and their ids 
( PRODUCT ID : PRODUCT )
( 402 : Apple Watch Series 1 )          
( 409 : Xbox Wireless Controller )     
( 403 : Apple iPhone 7 )               
( 411 : Samsung Curved Desktop )       
( 410 : Samsung Gear 360 )             
( 408 : DELL LED Desktop )             
( 404 : iPad Air 2 )                   
( 407 : Bose SoundLink Revolve )       
( 405 : Bang & Olufsen BeoPlay Speakers )
( 406 : Beats Solo3 Bluetooth Headset )
( 401 : Samsung Galaxy S9 | S9+ )
For example, you can say, " I'd like to order two (403) and three (407) for a tech setup."

products and their ids 
( PRODUCT ID : PRODUCT )
( 402 : Apple Watch Series 1 )          
( 409 : Xbox Wireless Controller )     
( 403 : Apple iPhone 7 )               
( 411 : Samsung Curved Desktop )       
( 410 : Samsung Gear 360 )             
( 408 : DELL LED Desktop )             
( 404 : iPad Air 2 )                   
( 407 : Bose SoundLink Revolve )       
( 405 : Bang & Olufsen BeoPlay Speakers )
( 406 : Beats Solo3 Bluetooth Headset )
( 401 : Samsung Galaxy S9 | S9+ )

You can specify like this "I'm interested in an 1 iPad Air 2 and a 1 Samsung Gear 360 for my creative projects.

products and their ids 
( PRODUCT ID : PRODUCT )
( 402 : Apple Watch Series 1 )          
( 409 : Xbox Wireless Controller )     
( 403 : Apple iPhone 7 )               
( 411 : Samsung Curved Desktop )

Ok, starting a new order. You can say things like " I'm interested in three (402) and two (404) devices for fitness and daily tasks."
